snippet: Al Jefferson had 24 points and 17 rebounds, and the Utah Jazz picked up their first road win of the season, beating the Toronto Raptors, 140-133, in triple overtime.
abstract: Utah Jazz defeat Toronto Raptors, 140-133, in triple overtime, earning their first road win of the season; other NBA scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Al Jefferson had 24 points and 17 rebounds, and the Utah Jazz picked up their first road win of the season, beating the Toronto Raptors, 140-133, in triple overtime.
